languages.text: "Предлагаете мне... стать вашим вассалом, шерин?" {n}Тлеющие угли в глазах Джай разгораются новыми искрами.{/n} "Но вы же не надеетесь обзавестись лишь новым псом, о шерин? Ибо вокруг вас и так слишком много тех, кто готов спать у ног, кормиться с рук и грызть глотки врагам. А я... я стану вашим вассалом, {name}. Если же и правда вам нужна".

traits.locale_text: "Предлагаете мне... стать вашим вассалом, шерин?" {n}Тлеющие угли в глазах Джай разгораются новыми искрами.{/n} "Но вы же не надеетесь обзавестись лишь новым псом, о шерин? Ибо вокруг вас и так слишком много тех, кто готов спать у ног, кормиться с рук и грызть глотки врагам. А я... я стану вашим вассалом, {name}. Если же и правда вам нужна".

languages.text: "Are you proposing that I become your vassal, shereen?" {n}The smouldering embers in Jae's eyes flare up with new sparks.{/n} "I trust you are not hoping to acquire a new dog, shereen? You are already surrounded by those ready to sleep at your feet, eat from the palm of your hand, and tear out your enemies' throats. But I... I will be your vassal, {name}. If you really need me."
languages.original_text: "Предлагаете мне... стать вашим вассалом, шерин?" {n}Тлеющие угли в глазах Джай разгораются новыми искрами.{/n} "Но вы же не надеетесь обзавестись лишь новым псом, о шерин? Ибо вокруг вас и так слишком много тех, кто готов спать у ног, кормиться с рук и грызть глотки врагам. А я... я стану вашим вассалом, {name}. Если же и правда вам нужна".

traits.locale_text: "Are you proposing... That I become your vassal, shereen?" {n}The smouldering embers in Jae's eyes flare up with new sparks.{/n} "I trust you are not hoping to get another dog, shereen? You are already surrounded by those ready to sleep at your feet, eat from the palm of your hand and rip your enemies' throats. But I... I will be your vassal, {name}. If you really need me."

"Are you proposing... That I become your vassal, shereen?" {n}The smouldering embers in Jae's eyes flare up with new sparks.{/n} "I trust you are not hoping to get another dog, shereen? You are already surrounded by those ready to sleep at your feet, eat from the palm of your hand and rip your enemies' throats. But I... I will be your vassal, {name}. If you really need me."

You are already surrounded by those ready to sleep at your feet, eat from the palm of your hand, and tear out your enemies' throats. But I... I will be your vassal, {name}. If you really need me."

"Are you proposing... That I become your vassal, shereen?" {n}The smouldering embers in Jae's eyes flare up with new sparks.{/n} "I trust you are not hoping to acquire another dog, shereen? You are already surrounded by those ready to sleep at your feet, eat from the palm of your hand, and tear out your enemies' throats. But I... I will be your vassal, {name}. If you really need me."

"Are you proposing... That I become your vassal, shereen?" {n}The smouldering embers in Jae's eyes flare up with new sparks.{/n} "I trust you are not hoping to acquire another dog, shereen? You are already surrounded by those ready to sleep at your feet, eat from the palm of your hand, and tear out your enemies' throats. But I... I will be your vassal, {name}. If you really need me."

languages.text: “你是在提议让我成为你的封臣吗，亲爱的？”{n}婕伊眼中闷燃的余烬中又燃起了新的火花。{/n}“我相信，你想得到的并不是另一条狗，是吧，亲爱的？你身边已经有很多人准备睡在你的脚边，吃你喂给他们的东西，撕开你敌人的喉咙。不过我……我愿意成为你的封臣，{name}……如果你真的需要我的话。”
languages.original_text: "Are you proposing that I become your vassal, shereen?" {n}The smouldering embers in Jae's eyes flare up with new sparks.{/n} "I trust you are not hoping to acquire a new dog, shereen? You are already surrounded by those ready to sleep at your feet, eat from the palm of your hand, and tear out your enemies' throats. But I... I will be your vassal, {name}. If you really need me."

traits.locale_text: “你是在提议让我成为你的封臣吗，亲爱的？”{n}婕伊眼中闷燃的余烬中又燃起了新的火花。{/n}“我相信，你想得到的并不是另一条狗，是吧，亲爱的？你身边已经有很多人准备睡在你的脚边，吃你喂给他们的东西，撕开你敌人的喉咙。不过我……我愿意成为你的封臣，{name}……如果你真的需要我的话。”
“你是在提议……让我成为你的封臣吗，亲爱的？”{n}婕伊眼中闷燃的余烬中又燃起了新的火花。{/n}“我相信，你想得到的并不是另一条狗，是吧，亲爱的？你身边已经有很多人准备睡在你的脚边，吃你喂给他们的东西，撕开你敌人的喉咙。不过我……我愿意成为你的封臣，{name}……如果你真的需要我的话。”

languages.original_text: "Are you proposing... That I become your vassal, shereen?" {n}The smouldering embers in Jae's eyes flare up with new sparks.{/n} "I trust you are not hoping to acquire another dog, shereen? You are already surrounded by those ready to sleep at your feet, eat from the palm of your hand, and tear out your enemies' throats. But I... I will be your vassal, . If you really need me."

languages.text: «¿Está proponiendo que me convierta en su vasalla, shereen?». {n}Las ascuas ardientes de los ojos de Jae se encienden con nuevas chispas.{/n} «Espero que no esté intentando hacerse con una nueva mascota, shereen. Ya está rodead{mf|o|a} de gente dispuesta a dormir a sus pies, comer de la palma de su mano y desgarrar la garganta de sus enemigos. Pero yo... Seré su vasalla, {name}. Si de verdad me necesita».
languages.original_text: "Are you proposing that I become your vassal, shereen?" {n}The smouldering embers in Jae's eyes flare up with new sparks.{/n} "I trust you are not hoping to acquire a new dog, shereen? You are already surrounded by those ready to sleep at your feet, eat from the palm of your hand, and tear out your enemies' throats. But I... I will be your vassal, {name}. If you really need me."

traits.locale_text: «¿Está proponiendo que me convierta en su vasalla, shereen?». {n}Las ascuas ardientes de los ojos de Jae se encienden con nuevas chispas.{/n} «Espero que no esté intentando hacerse con una nueva mascota, shereen. Ya está rodead{mf|o|a} de gente dispuesta a dormir a sus pies, comer de la palma de su mano y desgarrar la garganta de sus enemigos. Pero yo... Seré su vasalla, {name}. Si de verdad me necesita».

languages.text: 「あたしに家臣になれといっているの、シャリーン？」{n}ジェイの目の中にくすぶっていた火種が、新たな火花を散らして燃え上がる。{/n}「新しい犬を一匹、飼おうとか思っていないでしょうね、シャリーン？足元で眠り、手のひらから食べて、敵の喉を引き裂く用意のある者たちに、あんたはすでに囲まれているのよ。だけどあたしは…あんたの家臣になってあげるわ、{name}様。あたしが本当に必要ならね」
languages.original_text: "Are you proposing that I become your vassal, shereen?" {n}The smouldering embers in Jae's eyes flare up with new sparks.{/n} "I trust you are not hoping to acquire a new dog, shereen? You are already surrounded by those ready to sleep at your feet, eat from the palm of your hand, and tear out your enemies' throats. But I... I will be your vassal, {name}. If you really need me."

traits.locale_text: 「あたしに家臣になれといっているの、シャリーン？」{n}ジェイの目の中にくすぶっていた火種が、新たな火花を散らして燃え上がる。{/n}「新しい犬を一匹、飼おうとか思っていないでしょうね、シャリーン？足元で眠り、手のひらから食べて、敵の喉を引き裂く用意のある者たちに、あんたはすでに囲まれているのよ。だけどあたしは…あんたの家臣になってあげるわ、{name}様。あたしが本当に必要ならね」
「アンタは…アタシに家臣になれというのかい、シェリーン？」{n}ジェイの目の中にくすぶっていた火種が、新たな火花を散らして燃え上がる。{/n}「さらに一匹、犬を飼おうとは思っていないでしょうね、シェリーン？足元で眠り、手のひらから食べ、敵の喉を引き裂く用意のある者たちに、アンタはすでに囲まれている。でもアタシは…あんたの家臣になってやるよ、{name}。本当に必要ならね」

languages.text: "Schlagt Ihr mir vor ... Eure Vasallin zu werden, Shereen?" {n}Neue Funken blitzen in der glimmenden Glut in Jaes Augen auf.{/n} "Ihr wollt Euch doch hoffentlich keinen neuen Hund zulegen, Shereen? Ihr seid bereits von Leuten umgeben, die zu Euren Füßen schlafen, Euch aus der Hand fressen und Euren Feinden die Kehlen zerfetzen. Aber ich ... ich werde Eure Vasallin sein, {name}. Wenn Ihr mich wirklich braucht."
languages.original_text: "Are you proposing that I become your vassal, shereen?" {n}The smouldering embers in Jae's eyes flare up with new sparks.{/n} "I trust you are not hoping to acquire a new dog, shereen? You are already surrounded by those ready to sleep at your feet, eat from the palm of your hand, and tear out your enemies' throats. But I... I will be your vassal, {name}. If you really need me."

traits.locale_text: "Schlagt Ihr mir vor ... Eure Vasallin zu werden, Shereen?" {n}Neue Funken blitzen in der glimmenden Glut in Jaes Augen auf.{/n} "Ihr wollt Euch doch hoffentlich keinen neuen Hund zulegen, Shereen? Ihr seid bereits von Leuten umgeben, die zu Euren Füßen schlafen, Euch aus der Hand fressen und Euren Feinden die Kehlen zerfetzen. Aber ich ... ich werde Eure Vasallin sein, {name}. Wenn Ihr mich wirklich braucht."

"Wollt Ihr etwa vorschlagen ... Dass ich zu Eurer Vasallin werde, Shereen?" {n}Neue Funken blitzen in der glimmenden Glut in Jaes Augen auf.{/n} "Ihr wollt Euch doch hoffentlich keinen weiteren Hund zulegen, Shereen? Ihr seid schon umgeben von denen, die zu Euren Füßen schlafen, Euch aus der Hand fressen und Euren Feinden die Kohle zerfetzen. Aber ich ... Ich werde Eure Vasallin sein, {name}. Wenn Ihr mich wirklich benötigt."

languages.text: « Me proposez-vous de devenir votre vassale, shereen ? » {n}De nouvelles étincelles ravivent les braises ardentes dans les yeux de Jae.{/n} « J'espère que vous ne vous attendez pas à avoir un autre chien à vos pieds, shereen. Vous en avez déjà suffisamment qui vous mangent dans la main et sont prêts à sauter à la gorge de vos ennemis. Mais c'est d'accord... je serai votre vassale, {name}, si vous avez réellement besoin de moi. »
languages.original_text: "Are you proposing that I become your vassal, shereen?" {n}The smouldering embers in Jae's eyes flare up with new sparks.{/n} "I trust you are not hoping to acquire a new dog, shereen? You are already surrounded by those ready to sleep at your feet, eat from the palm of your hand, and tear out your enemies' throats. But I... I will be your vassal, {name}. If you really need me."

traits.locale_text: « Me proposez-vous de devenir votre vassale, shereen ? » {n}De nouvelles étincelles ravivent les braises ardentes dans les yeux de Jae.{/n} « J'espère que vous ne vous attendez pas à avoir un autre chien à vos pieds, shereen. Vous en avez déjà suffisamment qui vous mangent dans la main et sont prêts à sauter à la gorge de vos ennemis. Mais c'est d'accord... je serai votre vassale, {name}, si vous avez réellement besoin de moi. »

languages.text: "Vasalın olmamı mı teklif ediyorsun şirinim?" {n}Jae'ın gözlerindeki közlerin içinde yeni kıvılcımlar çakıyor.{/n} "Umarım yeni bir evcil köpek almaya çalışmıyorsundur şirinim? Ayaklarına kapanmak, avucundan yemek yemek ve düşmanlarının boynunu parçalamak için sırada bekleyen bir ton insan var zaten. Ben... Vasalın olurum {name}. İstiyorsan tabii."
languages.original_text: "Are you proposing that I become your vassal, shereen?" {n}The smouldering embers in Jae's eyes flare up with new sparks.{/n} "I trust you are not hoping to acquire a new dog, shereen? You are already surrounded by those ready to sleep at your feet, eat from the palm of your hand, and tear out your enemies' throats. But I... I will be your vassal, {name}. If you really need me."

traits.locale_text: "Vasalın olmamı mı teklif ediyorsun şirinim?" {n}Jae'ın gözlerindeki közlerin içinde yeni kıvılcımlar çakıyor.{/n} "Umarım yeni bir evcil köpek almaya çalışmıyorsundur şirinim? Ayaklarına kapanmak, avucundan yemek yemek ve düşmanlarının boynunu parçalamak için sırada bekleyen bir ton insan var zaten. Ben... Vasalın olurum {name}. İstiyorsan tabii."
